summary: This bill, the Special Diabetes Program Reauthorization Act of 2025, aims to reauthorize two programs: the Special Diabetes Program for Type 1 Diabetes and the Special Diabetes Program for Indians. It amends the Public Health Service Act to allocate funding for these programs. Specifically, it allocates $160,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2026 and 2027, and $40,000,000 for the period from October 1, 2027, to December 31, 2027, for each program.
